page.title: 14The Sawmill-1
page.content:
The{forest and sawmill}on Kinmount estates are run by the head forester Alec McDermott. Alec has to be quite fit for his job as he has a large area of forest to look after. The full extent of his job ranges from doing paperwork to sawing logs.
The sawmill has a{yearly output of 670 {tonnes}of wood. This wood is sold to mines for pit props, to farms as fencing, to pallet makers and furniture makers.
A lot of machinery is involved in the processing to prepare the wood for market. First it is cut and trimmed by chainsaw then it is taken to the sawmill where it goes through three saws. It is then taken by truck to market.
